resources.string: Thank you for downloading Weighted Calculator! If you have any questions or concerns, please email syfen.works@gmail.com.\n \nWith the Weighted Calculator, you can calculate a weighted average or calculate the mark you need for the final grade you want.

Calculate a Weighted Average 
Fill in all fields, but leave the final mark empty, and hit the Calculate button to get a weighted average.


Reverse Calculate a Mark 
Fill in all fields, including the final mark, and leave one Mark field empty. Hit the Calculate button to get the mark you need for the final average you want.


Auto-save 
Your marks will automatically be saved when you exit the app. Press Reset to clear all marks.


Precision 
All calculations are rounded to two decimal places.
Please fill in all marks or the final grade
